name: Waku Waku Marine
overview: Waku Waku Marine (わくわくマリン in Japanese) is a Kiddie Ride and Arcade Game that was made by Sega in 1992 in Japan only, and the fifth in the company's Waku Waku series of Kiddie Rides. It runs on Sega C-2 Arcade Hardware. When in motion, riders can use the steering wheel to move the fish, and press buttons to fire urchins. After 2 creatures, the rider will fight a shark. They can watch it on the screen, or fight it by pressing the urchin buttons. After the shark is defeated, the fish will find treasure, give it to the whale, and the ride will end.
